slokas.sanskrit: सर्वे भवन्तु सुखिनः सर्वे सन्तु निरामयाः
slokas.transliteration: Sarve bhavantu sukhinah sarve santu niramayah
slokas.translation: May all beings be happy, may all beings be free from illness
slokas.meaning: A universal prayer for the wellbeing of all living beings
A powerful mantra invoking peace on all levels - physical, mental, and spiritual
The entire world is one single family, promoting unity and universal brotherhood
